description:
Valentine`s Day draws near, and Nuku Nuku admits to her classmates that there`s someone she wants to give chocolate to. They all try to figure out who it is, except for Chieko, who jealously plots to steal Nuku Nuku`s chocolate. Mishima Industries` chocolate robot soon becomes the bigger problem—literally!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi Suru Nuku Nuku! Valentine wa Dare no Tame ni
Nuku Nuku Falls in Love! Who`s the Valentine for?
恋するヌクヌク! バレンタインは誰んためン
